name: THOMAS EHIS AMENKHIENAN
details: Tom holds a Bachelor of Science degree in Sociology from the then Bendel State University (now Ambrose Alli University Ekpoma). He has a varied experience, leading Non-Governmental Organizations (NGOs), as well as international TV broadcasting operations.

He is a member of the Institute of Directors (IoD). He chairs the Boards of Prime Feeds, Flour Mills and Loveworld Plus - one of the foremost 24hrs Satellite TV Stations in Africa.  Tom is also the Chairman of Innercity Mission for Children - an Internationally recognized NGO, dedicated to breaking the cycle of poverty, by delivering a sustainable solution to the problem of urban and rural child poverty.

Tom is, indeed, making a mark in the social sector. He was a member of the Board of Directors of Parallex Micro Finance Bank, during which he headed the Credit Committee. He also served as a member of the Information & Technology Steering Committee, set up by the board. He is a member of the Board of Trustees, Believers Love World and also serves as a director of Loveworld USA - a foremost satellite TV station in the United States of America.
